Georg Mischler <schorsch@schorsch.com> wrote:


> You know Jan Walters work, right?
> 
>   http://www.q-bus.de/Blender/download.html
> 
> All of that isn't brand new, and I don't know if he has worked on
> it since then, but it may be worth looking into that stuff.


Thanks for the reference.
Of course I know it, and my work is based on some of his code.


There is also another guy who has used Jan's code to build a
minimal export GUI to Radiance:


http://mywebpages.comcast.net/rayae1/tutorial.htm


Jan only released a static scene exporter, while I'm working on 
an export python module that saves animations, walkthroughs,
sun studies etc.
My module also has a GUI and initial library support.


You can see a preview image here:


http://www.dream.unipa.it/dream/pub/dot/anselmo/radiance/img/brad_preview.png


The supported languages will be italian and english, at
least at this development stage.


Hope to release its first development snapshot in September ...


Francesco.
